name: Dragon Quest Heroes I and II
overview: Two stories, “Dragon Quest Heroes: The Dark Dragon and the Castle of the World Tree” and “Dragon Quest Heroes II: The King of Twins and the End of Prophecy,” are included in one book. Get an exhilarating battle to scatter hordes of monsters, and incandescent battles with giant monsters! Improved additional characters, additional bosses, playability and operability! The ultimate work that you can enjoy multiplayer with your friends!
